rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2513%, F3701%}

description: Studio at honours level is research-oriented and non-prescriptive in terms of content. Students produce a proposal at the beginning of the semester but are free to carry out their work with any number of deviations from their original plans. The intentions of students and the results of their work are debated in group discussions and critical sessions.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
